content:
Jewelry organizers with individual slots are a great way to keep your jewelry organized and prevent tangling. Here are some affordable options under $50:

1. **Stackable Jewelry Tray by Songmics**: This 2-tiered tray has 24 individual slots for earrings, rings, and charms. It's made of velvet-lined plastic and is easy to clean. ($15-$20)
2. **Jewelry Organizer by Sorbus**: This compact organizer has 30 individual slots for earrings, rings, and charms. It's made of velvet-lined plastic and has a hinged lid. ($20-$25)
3. **Velvet Jewelry Box with Slots by Mele & Co.**: This luxurious velvet jewelry box has 24 individual slots for earrings, rings, and charms. It's a great value for the price. ($25-$30)
4. **Jewelry Storage Case by Pouch Direct**: This soft, fabric-covered case has 20 individual slots for earrings, rings, and charms. It's perfect for travel or daily storage. ($15-$20)
5. **Jewelry Organizer by Whitmor**: This 2-tiered organizer has 36 individual slots for earrings, rings, and charms. It's made of velvet-lined plastic and has a compact design. ($25-$30)
6. **Jewelry Box with Slots by Homde**: This wooden jewelry box has 24 individual slots for earrings, rings, and charms. It's a great option for those who prefer a more rustic look. ($25-$35)
7. **Jewelry Organizer by Zz Pro**: This compact organizer has 20 individual slots for earrings, rings, and charms. It's made of velvet-lined plastic and has a magnetic closure. ($15-$20)

All of these options are available on Amazon and have great reviews. Keep in mind that prices may vary depending on the seller and any promotions.

When shopping for a jewelry organizer with individual slots, consider the following factors:

* Material: Velvet-lined organizers are great for preventing scratching and tangling.
* Size: Choose an organizer that fits your jewelry collection and has enough slots for each piece.
* Design: Consider a compact design that fits on your dresser or a travel case that's easy to take on the go.
* Durability: Look for organizers made with high-quality materials that will last over time.

I hope this helps you find the perfect jewelry organizer for your needs and budget!
